channel.title: [SRL]Al Kharid Netter
channel.description:
[b][glow=red,2,300]Al Kharid Netter Version 1.2[/glow][/b]
[B]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/B] [B]SRL Version : [/B] 2.32 by [B]WhiteShadow[/B] [B]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/B] [B]Description[/B] This script nets shrimps and anchovies. Then banks them. Convinient for noob fish leveling. [B]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/B] [B]Instructions[/B] 1. Use Runescape Client, world w/ less players in it. To many players in bank make it hard for script to find bank symbol. 2. DeclarePlayers 3. *Start script Logged Out 4. Set Constants 5. Put players in Al Kharid bank with net in first inventory slot 6. Drag CrossHair - Run [B]Pick these Color Constants[/B] Blue of Fish Icon : [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img86.imageshack.us/img86/4218/fih2tw.png[/img][/URL] Gold of Bank Icon: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img53.imageshack.us/img53/9034/bank3wa.png[/img][/URL] [B]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/B] [B]Features[/B] +Switches Fish Icons really well +Multiple Player usage +Banks quickly +Runs from scorpian, I have 6 players and only 1 out of 6 died. They were around lvl 8 +No lag [B]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/B] [B]Bug/Issues[/B] -There are some Login problems sometimes -Because of Bank icon being crowded it has to logout [B]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/B] [B]Updates/Version History[/B] 1.0 - First Release 1.1 - Fixed Text Error, added MouseBack 1.2 - Login problem fixed [B]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/B] [B][Post bugs and feedback![/B] [B]Post progress reports![/B] Hopefully enjoy. :)

item.title: [SRL]Al Kharid Netter
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

This works for me, I have SRL 2.40.

I have only one problem with it, it always banks one load, and then it says " ‘my name’ has done enough trips" or something like it, and then log outs and tries to switch players. But I just have one account and I want to play with one character, so how can I do that?

Read full topic

it dosent work for me all it does is log in and stay logged in.

I’m not sure I haven’t tested this in a long while. Try starting script logged out. Drag crosshair, colorpick colors properly.

item.title: [SRL]Al Kharid Netter
item.dc:creator: @PyRo1 PyRo.
item.description:
@PyRo1 wrote:

<±-------------------------------------------+>
.:WhiteShadow Productions:.
Worked 54 Minutes, and 36 Seconds
Totally Banked 3 Load[s]
About 81 fish netted
<±-------------------------------------------+>

Stop manually, had to log off.

I have done multiple tests, only problems are:
One time it wouldn’t find the net, once it got the pheasent random, didn’t solve, got the frog random, didn’t solve.

Will run for an extended period of time later.

Over all its pretty good

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL]Al Kharid Netter
item.dc:creator: @WhiteShadow WhiteShadow
item.description:
@WhiteShadow wrote:

[glow=red,2,300]Al Kharid Netter Version 1.2[/glow]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SRL Version : 2.32 by WhiteShadow
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description
This script nets shrimps and anchovies. Then banks them. Convinient for noob fish leveling.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions
1. Use Runescape Client, world w/ less players in it. To many players in
bank make it hard for script to find bank symbol.
2. DeclarePlayers
3. *Start script Logged Out
4. Set Constants
5. Put players in Al Kharid bank with net in first inventory slot
6. Drag CrossHair - Run
Pick these Color Constants
Blue of Fish Icon :
Gold of Bank Icon:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Features
+Switches Fish Icons really well
+Multiple Player usage
+Banks quickly
+Runs from scorpian, I have 6 players and only 1 out of 6 died. They were around lvl 8
+No lag
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bug/Issues
-There are some Login problems sometimes
-Because of Bank icon being crowded it has to logout
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Updates/Version History
1.0 - First Release
1.1 - Fixed Text Error, added MouseBack
1.2 - Login problem fixed
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Post bugs and feedback!
Post progress reports!
Hopefully enjoy.

Read full topic
